video.title: Kôkyô shihen Eureka Sebun
video.synopsis: On a vastly transformed Earth ten millennia in the future, the young air-surfer or "lifter" Renton joins a rebel group and befriends the pilot Eureka.

episodes.synopsis: It's a boring life for average teen Renton until a mecha aircraft and pilot Eureka crash in his bedroom, bringing the rebels of Gekkostate with her.
episodes.title: Blue Monday

episodes.synopsis: As the military descends, Renton delivers his late father's invention to Eureka and unleashes Seven Swell -- her craft's hidden power.
episodes.title: Blue Sky Fish

episodes.synopsis: With the military closing in on Gekkostate, Renton helps concoct a decoy and divert soldiers away from Gekko, the rebel group's aircraft.
episodes.title: Motion Blue

episodes.synopsis: While a military plan brews, Renton joins Gekkostate to be closer to lovely Eureka and soon learns that a renegade's life isn't always exciting.
episodes.title: Watermelon

episodes.synopsis: Renton joins two Gekkostate pilots for some fun and pilots a combat robot for the first time -- after its real pilot has a little too much fun.
episodes.title: Vivid Bit

episodes.synopsis: Fun and games with the kids of Gekkostate wreak havoc for Renton and the ship. When it loses stealth power, he must fly a mission to save them all.
episodes.title: Childhood

episodes.synopsis: Helping Renton to earn respect with his Gekkostate companions, they send him on a dangerous "mission," which may not be what he suspects.
episodes.title: Absolute Defeat

episodes.synopsis: On errands with Eureka, Renton meets a Vodarac religion member who might be a friend or a suspected terrorist -- Gekkostate must uncover the truth.
episodes.title: Glorious Brilliance

episodes.synopsis: In Vodarac's holy land, Renton argues with Holland, then runs into the city and learns of its dissident status -- and of Gekkostate's beginnings.
episodes.title: Paper Moon Shine

episodes.synopsis: Gekkostate rebels are avid light particle surfers, so when he hears rumors of a big "wave," Holland tries diverting the Gekko so they can ride it.
episodes.title: Higher Than the Sun

episodes.synopsis: When a strange sphere appears in the sky, Gekkostate and its military enemy race to investigate, sparking a battle between the two factions.
episodes.title: Into the Nature

episodes.synopsis: The battle of opposing forces rages on as Renton, Eureka and an enemy pilot named Anemone are pulled inside the sphere and all share a strange dream.
episodes.title: Acperience 1

episodes.synopsis: With Eureka and Anemone injured in battle, Renton teams with his foe's assistant, Dominic, to hunt for medicine.
episodes.title: The Beginning

episodes.synopsis: With the Gekko down for repair, a weary crew takes time to reflect on the Coralian sphere and the connection between everyone it drew inside.
episodes.title: Memory Band

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to find fresh fruit, Renton shows Eureka his hometown, where Renton runs across people from his past, and things soon take an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Human Behaviour

episodes.synopsis: While the Gekko finishes repairs in an abandoned mine, Renton and Eureka have communication issues, and a tunnel expedition reveals a strange house.
episodes.title: Opposite View

episodes.synopsis: Renton and his Gekkostate companions hunt for creatures whose skin can repair the Gekko; meanwhile, Dewey briefs his unit on his secret plans.
episodes.title: Sky Rock Gate

episodes.synopsis: The caves are affecting Eureka's health, and Renton chats with a friendly miner who turns greedy when he spies Eureka's robot, the Nirvash typeZERO.
episodes.title: Ill Communication

episodes.synopsis: Sickened and depressed by the mine, Eureka removes her robot's communication device, sending it deep into the tunnels -- just as the military strikes.
episodes.title: Acperience 2

episodes.synopsis: When Eureka merges with a lifeform called Scub Coral, tensions between Renton and Holland rise. Both want to help her but can't work together.
episodes.title: Substance Abuse

episodes.synopsis: Holland And Eureka find a priest with a ritual to remove Scub Coral from her body -- not knowing that Renton ran way from the ship and from Gekkostate.
episodes.title: Runaway

episodes.synopsis: Renton's journey leads him into the city where he visits two freelance mercenaries aboard their ship.
episodes.title: Crackpot

episodes.synopsis: Renton's new companions are Charles and Ray Beams, and his latest mission to save a Vodarac girl pits science against her family's religious beliefs.
episodes.title: Differentia

episodes.synopsis: While Eureka and the Gekko crew deal with Renton's absence, Renton discovers his new shipmates were secretly hired to destroy Gekkostate.
episodes.title: Paradise Lost

episodes.synopsis: Weary after leaving the Swan, Renton collapses in a forest and is taken in by a kindly, wise couple; meanwhile, the Gekko is surrounded by the enemy.
episodes.title: World's End Garden

episodes.synopsis: Though the Gekko is surrounded by a military fleet, Eureka leaves the ship on a mission to find Renton.
episodes.title: Morning Glory

episodes.synopsis: Eureka and Renton are reunited, but locked in the brig for leaving without permission. Meanwhile, the Beams launch their planned Gekkostate attack.
episodes.title: Helter Skelter

episodes.synopsis: Charles is dead but Ray swears vengeance, setting her sights on harming Eureka, while Renton corners Holland about his connection to the Beams.
episodes.title: Memento Mori

episodes.synopsis: Back in Renton's hometown, the enemy digs up information on him, and Eureka's past is revealed -- a surprise to her crewmates, especially Renton.
episodes.title: Keep On Movin'

episodes.synopsis: Eureka's robot, Nirvash typeZERO, needs repair, so they land at its "birthplace" -- and Talho's emotions inspire her to makes some positive changes.
episodes.title: Change of Life

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Egan, a renowned researcher, thinks he knows what's wrong with the Nirvash. Dewey and one of the Sages discuss the future of the Coralians.
episodes.title: Animal Attack

episodes.synopsis: Renton's grandfather is put in charge of upgrades for the Nirvash just as an attack on the Coralians results in an all-out battle.
episodes.title: Start It Up

episodes.synopsis: The Gekko lands in the midst of the ruined city, and Holland and Talho have an important conversation that affects the entire future of Gekkostate.
episodes.title: Pacific State

episodes.synopsis: Holland reveals the truth about Norb and how he is connected to Eureka. Dewey and Norb discuss the future of the planet in the capital.
episodes.title: Inner Flight

episodes.synopsis: Gekkostate attacks the capital in order to rescue Norb, but Eureka's unwillingness to take any more lives hinders the operation.
episodes.title: Astral Apache

episodes.synopsis: Feelings between Renton and Eureka grows and Holland reveals his personal connection to Renton's family -- particularly, the boy's sister Diane.
episodes.title: Fantasia

episodes.synopsis: While the enemy's misunderstanding and hatred of Coralians grows, consensus builds between scientist and religious leader about Earth's future.
episodes.title: Raise Your Hand

episodes.synopsis: Eureka reveals she knew Renton's father -- and inspires a Gekkostate to convince the world that humans and Coralians can peacefully coexist.
episodes.title: Date of Birth

episodes.synopsis: Norb the monk insists everyone play a game of soccer; meanwhile, Dewey stirs hatred and prepares an attack.
episodes.title: Join the Future

episodes.synopsis: Gekkostate is at the Vodorak Shrine -- near a wall of Earth's instability and site of a looming attack. They learn what is needed to pass through.
episodes.title: Cosmic Trigger

episodes.synopsis: In the heart of the shrine, Eureka and Renton learn why communicating feelings is so important to Earth's future.
episodes.title: Acperience 3

episodes.synopsis: After the Scub Coral's antibody form is unleashed, only the Nirvash, Eureka, Renton and the kids make it through the Wall onto a shining beach.
episodes.title: Star Dancer

episodes.synopsis: On an empty beach, Eureka and Renton realize they've reached the Promised Land: Earth. They are lost and without purpose -- then the change begins.
episodes.title: Sunshine Underground

episodes.synopsis: While Holland recovers from battle, the Earthbound group tries to navigate unfamiliar terrain, find food, and understand Eureka's strange condition.
episodes.title: It's All in the Mind

episodes.synopsis: On the Gekko, two enemy soldiers have boarded to learn the truth from Gekkostate's scientist. On Earth, Eureka's transformation confounds everyone.
episodes.title: Don't You Want Me?

episodes.synopsis: Dewey has found the source of Scub Coral and plans to attack, while Holland and Gekkostate ready for war. Eureka's metamorphosis continues.
episodes.title: Planet Rock

episodes.synopsis: Renton and his sister, Diane, are reunited at the Scub Coral Command Center, where he learns of the Coralian's origins.
episodes.title: Acperience 4

episodes.synopsis: Dewey attacks the Command Center, awakening all of the Scub Coral and triggering Earth's destruction -- unless Eureka and Renton can save it.
episodes.title: Ballet Mecanique

episodes.synopsis: With Command Center destroyed, Dewey sets deadly sights on Renton and Eureka, and Eureka's transformation is clear: She is the new Command Center.
episodes.title: Shout to the Top!

episodes.synopsis: Eureka's new form is poised to trigger the world's end. To save them, Renton must give into his love for her and agree to sacrifice his humanity.
episodes.title: Wish Upon a Star
